title: Tropical Weil's reciprocity law and Weil's pairing
abstract:
The Weil reciprocity law asserts that given two meromorphic functions $f, g$
on a compact complex curve, the product of the values of $f$ over the roots and
poles of $g$ is equal to the product of the values of $g$ over the roots and
poles of $f$. We state and prove a tropical version of this reciprocity; the
tropical ideas lead to yet another transparent ``combinatorial'' proof of the
classical Weil reciprocity law. Then, we construct a tropical Weil pairing on
the set of divisors of degree zero.
